task.title: Creating a Reference Topic
task.shortdesc: Create a reference topic using Oxygen XML Author.

context.p: Reference topics provide quick access to fact-based information. In technical information, reference topics are used to list product specifications and parameters, provide essential data, and provide detailed information on subjects such as the commands in a programming language. Use this procedure to create a task topic using Oxygen XML Author.

step.cmd: Open an instance of Oxygen XML Author.
Frm the top left hand corner, click File New
step.stepresult: The Choose a file template dialog box displays.

step.cmd: Create a task topic as follows:

substep.cmd: In the field provided, type task.
In the Title field, enter a name for your reference topic.
Observe the path on your computer where the file is being created. Ensure that the path is correct.
